CustomField.description: Formula field to combine the logic to concatenate the selected Tocuhpoint add ons
CustomField.formula: IF(!ISPICKVAL(Phone_no_Status__c, 'Nummer skal porteres') && ISBLANK(Activation__r.UC_Activation_Date__c) && Activation__r.Case__r.Account.Customer_has_Touchpoint__c, IF( Touchpoint_Bruger__c , 'TPSUSER,','') & IF( Touchpoint_Receptionist__c , 'TPSRECEP,','') & IF( Touchpoint_Softphone__c , 'TPSSOFT,','') & IF( Touchpoint_Statistik__c , 'TPSSTAT,',''), IF( Touchpoint_Bruger__c , 'TPSUSERD,,','') & IF( Touchpoint_Receptionist__c , 'TPSRECEPD,','') & IF( Touchpoint_Softphone__c , 'TPSSOFTD,','') & IF( Touchpoint_Statistik__c , 'TPSSTATD,','')) & IF( Attendant_Agent_login__c, 'TPXATTAGT,','') & IF( Supervisor__c, 'TPXSUPV,','')
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Formula field to combine the logic to concatenate the selected Tocuhpoint add ons
CustomField.label: Touchpoint Addons
